Module Contents
---------------

.. py:data:: SITE_CACHE

.. py:class:: SiteManager

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.db.models.Manager`


   .. py:attribute:: use_in_migrations
      :value: True



   .. py:method:: get_current(request=None)

      Return the current Site based on the SITE_ID in the project's settings.
      If SITE_ID isn't defined, return the site with domain matching
      request.get_host(). The ``Site`` object is cached the first time it's
      retrieved from the database.



   .. py:method:: clear_cache()

      Clear the ``Site`` object cache.



   .. py:method:: get_by_natural_key(domain)


.. py:class:: Site

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.db.models.Model`


   .. py:attribute:: domain


   .. py:attribute:: name


   .. py:attribute:: objects


   .. py:class:: Meta

      .. py:attribute:: db_table
         :value: 'django_site'



      .. py:attribute:: verbose_name


      .. py:attribute:: verbose_name_plural


      .. py:attribute:: ordering
         :value: ['domain']




   .. py:method:: natural_key()


.. py:function:: clear_site_cache(sender, **kwargs)

   Clear the cache (if primed) each time a site is saved or deleted.
